p.strong: Bowman County Public School will be closed indefinitely to all individuals except essential personnel as a result of the Governor's executive order. Please check our school's website and social media pages for updated information in the coming days.
If you have any questions or concerns please contact the school at 523-3283
Due to the COVID-19 virus, the Bowman County playground and stadium/track facility are off limits until further notice. Thank you for your understanding.
Bowman County Schools will be providing a free sack breakfast and lunch for children aged 1-18. We ask that requests for meals are made by 9 AM each day. Please fill out the

. If you are unable to fill out the form, you can also call Bowman Elementary (701-523-3358) or Rhame Elementary (701-279-5523) to make a request. Pick ups will be from 11:30-12:30 at both campuses. Bowman pick up will be at the Middle School Loop; Rhame pick up will be at the office doors. If you are unable to pick up and would need meals delivered, please note on the order form or call Mr. Strand.
Parents/Guardians: If you have not filled out the needs assessment form from Bowman County Public Schools, please call the high school office at 701-523-3283
